history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: divides_mult,pred,fact. qsimpl time: 1 use: divides_mult,pred,fact. qsimpl time: 1 use: divides_le,divides_mult,pred,fact.

original: intros H. apply divides_mult with (q := fact (pred p)). - unfold fact. rewrite Nat.sub_0_r. apply divides_le with (q := fact m). ++ intro H0. subst. inversion H. ++ apply Nat.le_refl. - apply H.
